page.title: 16KILBURN(DERBY)AREA:SWIMMING
page.content: {SWIMMING POOL Only 200 people can use the pool at once because there are only 200 baskets for peoples clothes though it would be possible for more people to use the water. Lessons go on continuosly from 9.00am to 7.50pm from Mondays to Fridays and there are two swimming club sessions every evening from 8.00pm to 9.00pm and from 9.00 to 10.00pm. The five clubs which use the pool are Belper Ladies, Thorntons, Glowworm, Belper Malin and the Sub_aqua club. The water in the pool is never changed. When the dirty water splashes out of the pool it drains back into a big pipe and into a filter of sand. As the water runs through the sand it is then pumped into a heater and returned into a pool.
